name: res_chess
description:
Win your opponent in chess-like game♜

    The game takes place in a world of the future in which two sides exist - a highly developed civilization that has comprehended the use of water as fuel for mobile nuclear fusion plants. But there were also those who were thrown back several periods of technological development in this world. But they still have outdated bikes, cars and tanks with a bunch of gunpowder weapons in their arsenal. So who will win in this harsh world of the future?
